short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture articles, social media posts, and webpages with 1-click -- use AI to chat, search, and organize bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Findr: Your Ultimate AI Bookmark Manager
Losing track of valuable content scattered across the web? With Findr, you can save, organize, and chat with your bookmarks from a single place. 


Why Choose Findr?
Findr is your AI bookmark assistant, helpful for organising and searching your bookmarks. Whether you're a researcher, writer, engineer, marketer, or someone who loves staying organised, it has the features you need:

🚀 One-Click Bookmarking
Save content effortlessly with a single click

💬 AI-Powered Chat & Summaries
Interact with your saved bookmarks and extract key insights instantly

🔍 Smart Search
Quickly find what you need with fuzzy search across saved content

📚 Effortless organization
Use collections to categorize and tag bookmarks to keep your library tidy and accessible

🌐 Cloud Sync
Access your bookmarks anytime, anywhere, across all your devices

🔗 Shareable Links
Share your bookmarks with friends and colleagues with a single click

🔒 Privacy-first
Your privacy is guaranteed. Findr is SOC2 and ISO compliant and never uses your data for training purposes - whether it's your uploaded files, saved materials, or AI conversations. You retain complete control.


Designed for those who: 
- Cannot lose valuable ideas, inspiration, or creative sparks
- Save 2 hours daily by avoiding endless tab searches
- Maintain creative flow and focus while working


Perfect for:
- Capturing interesting articles, blogs, and forums
- Saving ideas, references, and websites
- Bookmarking and organizing social media posts, links, and code snippets


How It Works:
- Install the Findr Chrome Extension
- Click the Findr icon while browsing to instantly save the content
- Chat, search, and organize your bookmarks using AI in your memory wall
